episodes.title: The young people speaking out against the Universal Church of the Kingdom of God
episodes.description: Rachael Reign was an active member of an evangelical Christian church with branches worldwide. It was only after leaving that she came to believe it had exposed her to a ‘horrendous’ ordeal. Maeve McClenaghan reports. Help support our independent journalism at theguardian.com/infocus
subjects: Universal Church of the Kingdom of God
